section.title: Highlights
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

listitem.para: User channels are now in the default NIX_PATH, allowing users to use their personal nix-channel defined channels in nix-build and nix-shell commands, as well as in imports like import <mychannel>.
listitem.programlisting: $ nix-channel --add https://nixos.org/channels/nixpkgs-unstable nixpkgsunstable $ nix-channel --update $ nix-build '<nixpkgsunstable>' -A gitFull $ nix run -f '<nixpkgsunstable>' gitFull $ nix-instantiate -E '(import <nixpkgsunstable> {}).gitFull'
